directions: Put orange slices, lemon slices, and lime slices in a large punch bowl. Pour sugar over the fruit; add tequila and mix gently with a wooden spoon. Let soak 6 hours to overnight.
Put plenty of ice in the punch bowl. Pour white wine, champagne, and club soda over the ice. Stir and serve immediately.
ingredients: 2 trays ice cubes, or as needed
title: Mr. Big's White Sangria
